name: Customer Churn Overview
description: Shows churn trends, retention rates, and customer lifecycle across regions and segments.

kpis.name: Monthly Churn Rate
kpis.description: Percentage of customers lost in a month compared to total active customers.

kpis.name: Retention Rate
kpis.description: Percentage of customers retained over a given time period.

kpis.name: Average Customer Lifespan
kpis.description: Average duration a customer stays active before churn.

kpis.name: Net Promoter Score (NPS)
kpis.description: Measures customer satisfaction and likelihood to recommend the product.

name: Sales Performance Dashboard
description: Tracks sales revenue, targets, and conversion rates across products and regions.

kpis.name: Total Sales Revenue
kpis.description: Overall revenue generated in the selected period.

kpis.name: Sales Target Achievement
kpis.description: Percentage of sales target achieved for the current period.

kpis.name: Lead Conversion Rate
kpis.description: Percentage of leads converted into paying customers.

kpis.name: Average Deal Size
kpis.description: Average value of closed deals during the reporting period.

name: Marketing Campaign Insights
description: Analyzes marketing campaign performance across channels and audience segments.

kpis.name: Campaign ROI
kpis.description: Return on investment for all active marketing campaigns.

kpis.name: Click-Through Rate (CTR)
kpis.description: Percentage of people who clicked on ads compared to impressions.

kpis.name: Cost per Acquisition (CPA)
kpis.description: Average cost of acquiring a new customer through marketing.

kpis.name: Engagement Rate
kpis.description: Level of interaction from the target audience across platforms.

name: Financial Health Tracker
description: Monitors financial KPIs including revenue, expenses, and profitability.

kpis.name: Gross Profit Margin
kpis.description: Percentage of revenue remaining after cost of goods sold.

kpis.name: Operating Expense Ratio
kpis.description: Operating expenses as a percentage of revenue.

kpis.name: Net Profit Margin
kpis.description: Percentage of revenue converted into net income.

kpis.name: Cash Flow
kpis.description: Net amount of cash moving in and out of the business.

name: Human Resources Overview
description: Tracks employee performance, retention, and workforce composition.

kpis.name: Employee Turnover Rate
kpis.description: Percentage of employees leaving the organization during a period.

kpis.name: Average Employee Tenure
kpis.description: Average length of service for employees.

kpis.name: Training Hours per Employee
kpis.description: Average number of training hours completed per employee.

kpis.name: Employee Engagement Score
kpis.description: Measures employee satisfaction and engagement levels.

name: Customer Support Dashboard
description: Monitors support ticket resolution times, satisfaction, and issue trends.

kpis.name: First Response Time
kpis.description: Average time taken to respond to a support request.

kpis.name: Resolution Time
kpis.description: Average time taken to fully resolve a customer issue.

kpis.name: Customer Satisfaction (CSAT)
kpis.description: Average satisfaction rating from support feedback surveys.

kpis.name: Ticket Backlog
kpis.description: Number of unresolved tickets at any given time.

name: Website Analytics Dashboard
description: Tracks website traffic, user engagement, and conversion funnel performance.

kpis.name: Unique Visitors
kpis.description: Number of distinct users visiting the website.

kpis.name: Bounce Rate
kpis.description: Percentage of visitors leaving after viewing only one page.

kpis.name: Average Session Duration
kpis.description: Average time users spend on the site per session.

kpis.name: Conversion Rate
kpis.description: Percentage of visitors completing desired actions like purchases or signups.

name: E-commerce Performance Tracker
description: Analyzes online sales performance, order trends, and customer purchase patterns.

kpis.name: Average Order Value
kpis.description: Average revenue earned per customer order.

kpis.name: Cart Abandonment Rate
kpis.description: Percentage of online shoppers who add items to the cart but don't complete the purchase.

kpis.name: Repeat Purchase Rate
kpis.description: Percentage of customers making multiple purchases.

kpis.name: Order Fulfillment Time
kpis.description: Average time taken from order placement to delivery.

name: IT Infrastructure Monitoring
description: Tracks uptime, system performance, and incident response metrics.

kpis.name: System Uptime
kpis.description: Percentage of time systems are operational.

kpis.name: Mean Time to Resolution (MTTR)
kpis.description: Average time taken to resolve IT incidents.

kpis.name: Incident Frequency
kpis.description: Number of incidents reported during a period.

kpis.name: Server Response Time
kpis.description: Average time taken for servers to respond to requests.

name: Supply Chain Overview
description: Monitors supplier performance, inventory levels, and delivery timelines.

kpis.name: On-Time Delivery Rate
kpis.description: Percentage of orders delivered on or before the promised date.

kpis.name: Inventory Turnover
kpis.description: Number of times inventory is sold and replaced during a period.

kpis.name: Supplier Lead Time
kpis.description: Average time taken by suppliers to deliver goods.

kpis.name: Backorder Rate
kpis.description: Percentage of orders delayed due to out-of-stock items.

name: Healthcare Patient Outcomes
description: Tracks patient recovery rates, readmission rates, and treatment effectiveness.

kpis.name: Patient Satisfaction Score
kpis.description: Average satisfaction rating from patient feedback surveys.

kpis.name: Readmission Rate
kpis.description: Percentage of patients readmitted within 30 days of discharge.

kpis.name: Treatment Success Rate
kpis.description: Percentage of patients successfully treated.

kpis.name: Average Length of Stay
kpis.description: Average number of days patients remain in the hospital.

name: Energy Consumption Dashboard
description: Monitors energy usage, efficiency, and cost savings initiatives.

kpis.name: Total Energy Consumption
kpis.description: Total energy used by the organization in kilowatt-hours.

kpis.name: Energy Efficiency Ratio
kpis.description: Energy output compared to energy input efficiency.

kpis.name: Carbon Footprint
kpis.description: Total greenhouse gas emissions produced.

kpis.name: Cost Savings from Efficiency
kpis.description: Monetary savings from implemented energy efficiency measures.

name: Project Management Dashboard
description: Tracks project timelines, budgets, and deliverables.

kpis.name: Project Completion Rate
kpis.description: Percentage of projects completed on time compared to total planned projects.

kpis.name: Budget Variance
kpis.description: Measures the difference between the budgeted and actual project costs.

kpis.name: Task Completion Rate
kpis.description: Percentage of tasks completed within deadlines across all projects.

kpis.name: Resource Utilization
kpis.description: Tracks the allocation and workload of team members to ensure optimal use.

name: Retail Store Performance
description: Analyzes in-store sales, foot traffic, and inventory turnover.

kpis.name: Sales per Square Foot
kpis.description: Measures the efficiency of sales relative to store size.

kpis.name: Foot Traffic
kpis.description: Number of customers visiting the store.

kpis.name: Inventory Turnover
kpis.description: How quickly inventory is sold and replaced.

kpis.name: Gross Margin Return on Investment (GMROI)
kpis.description: Profit return on the cost of inventory investment.

name: Social Media Engagement
description: Tracks brand engagement, audience growth, and campaign performance on social platforms.

kpis.name: Follower Growth Rate
kpis.description: Percentage increase in followers over a period.

kpis.name: Post Engagement Rate
kpis.description: Percentage of audience interacting with posts.

kpis.name: Share of Voice
kpis.description: Brand's presence in online conversations compared to competitors.

kpis.name: Video View Rate
kpis.description: Percentage of video views compared to total impressions.
